selectLicence.intro.text: Apply for a list of economic licences issued by the Department of Economic Development that are registered under your account.

errorPage.text: An error occured while trying to complete your request. Please try again later.
successPage.text: Congratulations! Your payment was successful and your list has been issued. You can download the receipt and the letter from here.
successPage.title: Your Licences List Has Been Issued.
payment.subtitle: Payment
payment.description: Please find below your payment summary based on your selection. Please note that this payment can only by made with a credit card
terms.label: I do hereby undertake to comply with all the conditions and requriements stipulated in the laws and resolutions regulating the economic activities related to issuing, renewing and amending commercial licences and all the data included in the  application. I also undertake not to practice the commercial activity until after obtaining the approvals from the relevant authorities. The DED has the right to take all legal and administrative actions in the case that this undertaking is breached.
